ygData.subject: Island, part three
ygData.msgSnippet: Now that Aerostreak and Grappler had met in the forest, and realized that they were Predacons, they needed to find Guanatix who shared there symbol. Yesss.

To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

    Now that Aerostreak and Grappler had met in the forest, and realized that 
they were Predacons, they needed to find Guanatix who shared there symbol.
    "Yesss. This is a fine idea! We will over power the other three and move 
to where the other Predacons are!" Grappler hissed happily. He went to his 
hip and pulled forth a small pistol. 
    Aerostreak laughed with evil glee. "This will be perfect! If we come with 
enemy prisoners, then we will be greatly regaruded! No doubt we will be 
welcome." He too pulled out a gun just as Guanatix slipped from a nearby 
branch.
    "I think you two are genius'!" She said, transforming and, also, pulled 
out a pistol. "Besides, the others are weak."
    "Then its agreed. We will destroy the camp, take the Maximals as 
prisoners, and relocate to the Predacon fortress, if there is one." Aerostrak 
said. The other nodded, and then began to head back to camp.

    Nighteyes, Aquarious, and Paddletail watched as the three others emerged 
from the jungle, carrying guns. This was very strange because they never used 
there guns. It was one of the rules they established in the beggining.
    "I dont like this. They look....there eyes are filled with anger." 
Nighteyes said. Paddletail and Aquarious agreed.
    As the others got closer, Nighteyes began to panic, as did her commrads. 
Aerostreak then raised his gun, pointed it towrds the campfire, and sent a 
blast streaking towrds them.
    Nighteyes, Aquarious, and Paddletail jumped away. Grappler and Gunantix 
then began to set ablaze the huts. Nighteyes grabbed Paddletail and brought 
him close.
    "We have to get out of here! I dont know whats going on, but we have to 
get out of here now!" She screamed. Aquarious was already running into the 
safety of the jungle.
    Paddletail agreed, and along with Nighteyes, dashed for the jungle. The 
three met and ran as hard and as fast as they could from the evil that had 
overtaken there brothers and sister.
    "Victory! Now, after them! Aerostreak, dont let them get away! Grappler, 
prepare a net." Gunatix yelled as she began the pursuit.
    The hawlk took to the sky in his warrior mode, keeping a close eye on the 
runaways. Grappler followed Guanatix who was only a few meters behinde the 
Maximals. She gave the signal and he launched a net, captureing Nighteyes and 
Aquarious.
    Aerostreak then sent two optic laser sreaking down at Paddletail who fell 
to the ground with a broken leg. He swooped down, grabbed him, and returned 
to the burning camp.

    "That was very bold. But, your our prisoners now. Paddletail will help 
Grappler construct a raft that will take all of us to the mainland." 
Aerostreak siad to the captives. By now the huts were ash, and the only thing 
left was the radio.
    "I will not help in our demise! Its ridiculous!" Paddletail argued.
    "Yes you will or we will kill Nighteyes." Grappler said snugly.
    Paddletail shighed. He had no choice. They would have to help the 
Predacons and then, of course, go with them.
